root.name: Game Party: In Motion
root.description: Game Party: In Motion is a minigame collection for Xbox 360/ Kinect, developed by Warner Brothers Games. The multiplayer, motion-controlled game collection, featuring the player's avatars, includes: Ping Cup Hoop Shoot Table Hockey Darts Puck Bowling Horseshoe Hysteria Pool Hall Party Root Beer Tapper Double RacquetsSkill BallTic Tac Toe FaceoffQB in Motion
